oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fourth of July Dresses
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Harriet "Hattie" Massengill and Martha "Mattie" Williford Vesser (1869-1962) in crepe paper dress for Fourth of July celebration. They won a prize for their costumes.
Sam S. Masengill (1882-1962) was married to Harriet Adeline "Hattie" Henson Masengill (1883-1985).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fourth of July celebrations; Celebrations; Events; Costumes; Clothing & dress
